page.title: 14EASTERN NATIONAL BUS COMPANY
page.content: Eastern National Bus Company provide a bus service five days a week to Tumblers Green. This service is regularly used by schoolchildren who travel into Braintree in the morning and return home later in the afternoon. Greenstead Green has two services, one of which goes to Halstead on Market Days Tuesday's, Friday's and Saturday's. There is a service to Braintree on Wednesday's for the market held there. Most families have their own motor cars which are very necessary living in a rural community.
